head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MEYER, FRANCES M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MEYER, FRANCES M.

block.p: MEYER-Frances M. Of Forest Hills, NY, on October 28, 2000. Beloved wife of Christian C. Loving mother of Francesca DeLasho and mother-in-law of Robert L. Friends may call on Monday, from 2-5 and 7-9:30 PM, at the Thomas F. Dalton Funeral Home, Hicksville Chapel, 47 Jerusalem Ave. (3 blocks north of Old Country Rd.). Funeral Mass Tuesday, 9:45 AM, St. Ignatius R.C. Church, Hicksville. Interment Calverton National Cemetery.
